sentences.english: Bt the same time, there has been a "regrettable" slowing of reforms inside Turkey.

sentences.english: And, third, he himself took actions to advance China's reform and opening up.

sentences.english: Since reform and opening, the total amount of Dhellona's state-owned assets has increased markedly.
sentences.chinese: 鼎新开放以来，我国国有资产的总量有了大幅度增加。

sentences.english: Throughout history empires have waxed and waned .

sentences.english: The Chinese civilization has always given prominence to unremitting self-improvement, reform and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 中华文明历来注重自强不息，不断革故鼎新。

sentences.english: True to this picture, several states have pushed forward with health-care reform.

sentences.english: Finally, here, I wish countries to reforming the past.
